<title level="1" pfs="">[Chronicler](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3470)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Exploration means very little if no account of the expedition exists. Members of adventuring bands cherish chroniclers who record tales of their deeds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Chronicler.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Chronicler](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3470)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 54

**Perception** +12

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43) +10, [Scribing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +13, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +7, [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), journal, [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [maps](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3585), [_scroll of acid grip_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1436), [_scroll of heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

**Live to Tell the Tale** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The chronicler would gain the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=69) condition; **Effect** The chronicler instead falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) for 1d4 hours or until they regain 1 Hit Point.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +8 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +7 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 20, attack +12
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Frostbite](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539), [Know the Way](/Spells.aspx?ID=1582), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Tangle Vine](/Spells.aspx?ID=1713)
- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Tailwind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1711), [Vanishing Tracks](/Spells.aspx?ID=1737)
- **2nd**
[Entangling Flora](/Spells.aspx?ID=1515), [Floating Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=1533)

**Scroll Mastery**   The chronicler can activate any scroll of a 2nd-rank spell or lower, regardless of its magical tradition.

</column>
